comments.body:
Nothing is actually exported here so this isn't really doing anything.
What's your goal with this package? Are you trying to describe some package with no runtime components?

Oh I see what you're doing here. Am I correct in understanding that you want to define types for a future version of the w3c dom spec, before it would be appropriate for them to be added to the TypeScript lib?

yes exactly. we don't put w3c drafts in the generator but rather place them here until they reach candidate recommendation. 

i haven't submitted a DOM API here before though so this may well be wrongly structured..
